question_text: Which of the following are true about hosted hypervisors? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: They rely on an existing operating system to run
They have higher overhead than bare metal hypervisors
They cannot manage multiple virtual machines simultaneously
They include examples like VMware Workstation and Parallels Desktop
correct_answer: They rely on an existing operating system to run
They have higher overhead than bare metal hypervisors
They include examples like VMware Workstation and Parallels Desktop
explanation: Hosted hypervisors (Type 2) operate within a host OS, increasing overhead and offering less direct hardware control.
